# [FEAT] Help Center Themes

## Labels
`customization`, `knowledge-base`, `priority:low`

## Description
Implement customizable themes for the help center/knowledge base interface.

## Requirements

### Theme System
- Theme marketplace
- Custom theme creation
- Theme editor
- Live preview
- Theme export/import

### Theme Components
- Header customization
- Footer customization
- Navigation style
- Article layout
- Search interface
- Category pages
- Home page layout

### Customization Options
- CSS customization
- JavaScript additions
- Template modifications
- Component overrides
- Responsive design

### Theme Elements
- Typography settings
- Color palette
- Spacing/margins
- Border styles
- Shadow effects
- Animation options

### Advanced Features
- Custom page templates
- Widget zones
- Dynamic content areas
- Conditional content
- A/B testing themes

### Theme Management
- Theme versioning
- Rollback capability
- Theme cloning
- Staging environment
- Publishing workflow

## Zendesk Reference
Enterprise plans provide custom themes for help centers with extensive customization options.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Theme system works
- [ ] CSS customization available
- [ ] Live preview functional
- [ ] Multiple themes supported
- [ ] Theme versioning works
